subject: Baseball
Frauds and Swindling
lead_paragraph: Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz, the owners of the Mets who are heavily in debt, will not receive a multi-million dollar payout connected with a settlement in the conviction of Bernard L. Madoff.
snippet: Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz, the owners of the Mets who are heavily in debt, will not receive a multi-million dollar payout connected with a settlement in the conviction of Bernard L. Madoff.
